content: Can you tell me if the pain is constant, or does it come and go?
Is the pain localized to one specific tooth, or are you feeling it in multiple areas?
Are you experiencing any sensitivity to hot or cold foods and drinks?
Yes , it reacts to hot and cold

Available doctors for General Dentistry:
- Dr. Dr Sharma — SmileCare Central
- Dr. Anita Sharma — SmileCare Clinic
- Dr. Rahul Mehta — BrightTooth Center

Which doctor would you like to book with?
Before I show slots, may I confirm — do you have dental insurance?
Please share your insurance provider name and member/policy ID.
Thanks. Here are available slots with Dr. Anita Sharma. Select one to confirm booking.
